quoteText: You can usually access, correct, or delete your personal data using your account settings and tools that we offer, but if you arenâ€™t able to do that, or you would like to contact us about one of the other rights, scroll down to How to Reach Us to, well, find out how to reach us.
title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service
tosdr.tldr: This used to say that you can't delete your content from this service, but you can by deleting your Wordpress account, according to the linked excerpt.
